attributes.action: give pregnant women the right to choose which swine flu vaccine they receive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please allow pregnant women the right to choose between the two swine flu vaccines that are available. After hours of research is seems Pandemrix, which has been chosen for the UK, contains a chemical which may be unsafe for pregnant women. As a pregnant woman I am very worried about contracting swine flu especially after the recent deaths reported in the news. Please allow us the right to choose so that we can accept it with the confidence that it will have no ill effect on their unborn children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
